mapper.select: select count(*) from review where bookNum=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into review values(seq_review_idx.nextVal, #{id}, #{content}, #{ip}, sysdate, seq_review_idx.currVal, 0, 0, #{bookNum}, #{rating})
mapper.update: update review set step = step + 1 where ref = #{ref} and step > #{step}
